GSD.product_version: versions from v4.2 to before v5.4.211
GSD.description:
ASoC: mediatek: mt8173: Fix refcount leak in mt8173_rt5650_rt5676_dev_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit d6d41f04640db0f946e2c3f7963bb2774afc7a0d, it was introduced in version v4.2 by commit 94319ba10ecabc8f28129566d1f5793e3e7a0a79. For more details please see the references link.
